english.segment1: Lord of empty space. You breathe and then create. Before the earth was made. You are
english.segment2: The king of every age. Outside of time and space. All the heavens speak Your name. You are. You are
english.segment3: Lord of brilliant light. You separate the night. And everything inside. You are
english.segment4: The one who calms the seas. And every part of me. With just a word you speak. You are. You are
english.segment5: I give You all of me for all You are. Here I am. Take me apart. Take me apart
english.segment6: Angels bowing down. Beneath the rushing sound. A voice that thunders out. You are
english.segment7: The one who holds the stars. And the beating of my heart. Exalted above all You are. You are
english.segment8: All I am I want to lay down at your feet
